name: ASL BPO
description:
ASL is a Virtual Assistant and Data Entry Firm that has been established in 2012. Its primary focus is to provide Virtual Assistance and Data Entry Services to small and medium sized companies by taking away tasks that are time consuming, require monitoring and specialized training, so that they can save their time and money and refocus them to more profitable work that makes their business grow.
Our services are flexible and range from simple data entry to complicated and specialized tasks such as SEO, Web designing and Research work. Our Virtual Assistants are smart and professional, each individual being specialized in different tasks.
Our smart outsourcing solutions guarantees to save your money upto 30-40%, that would have otherwise been incurred as extra costs that comes with hiring and training inhouse employees.
